mapper.select: SELECT S.STADIUM_NAME AS stadiumName, S.STADIUM_ADDRESS AS stadiumAddress, S.STADIUM_CATEGORY AS category, M.MEM_NAME AS referee FROM STADIUM S JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEM_NO = S.MEM_NO WHERE STADIUM_NO = #{stadiumNo}
SELECT T.TEAM_NAME AS opponent, CONCAT( R.MATCH_COUNT , '전 ', R.WIN, '승 ', R.LOSE, '패 ', R.DRAW, '무' ) AS result FROM TEAM T JOIN TEAM_RECORD R ON R.TEAM_NO = T.TEAM_NO WHERE T.TEAM_NO = #{teamANo}

SELECT M.RESERV_START AS reservStart, M.RESERV_END AS reservEnd, S.STADIUM_NAME AS stadiumName FROM `MATCH` M JOIN STADIUM S ON M.STADIUM_NO = S.STADIUM_NO WHERE M.TEAM_A_NO IS NOT NULL AND M.TEAM_B_NO IS NULL;
